column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a ɔhen Hezekia tsee no

column2: "Na ɔsomaa Eliakim a ɔhwɛ fidua no do no
column6: ma wɔkɔr Amoz ne ba nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaia nkyɛn."

column2: "Na wɔsee no dɛ
column6: na ɔsesar da: osiandɛ mba edu awoko mu
column7: na ahoɔdzen nnyi hɔ a wɔdze bɔwo hɔn."

column2: "Annyɛ a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛtse Rabsake a no wura Asiriahen asoma no dɛ ɔmbɔsopa tseasefo Nyankopɔn no
column4: na ɔaka n'enyim wɔ nsɛm a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn atse no ntsi: dɛm ntsi ma wo mpaabɔ do ma nkaa no a wɔaka no."

column2: "Nna ɔhen Hezekia no nkowaa no baa Isaia nkyɛn."
"Na Isaia see hɔn dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ hom nkɛka nkyerɛ hom wura nye yi
column5: Mma nnsuro nsɛm a atse no a Asiriahen no nkowaa dze aka mo ho ebususɛm no."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: medze sunsum bi mebɛhyɛ no mu
column5: na ɔasan akɔ nankasa n'asaase do; na mebɛma ɔatɔ wɔ afona ano wɔ nankasa n'asaase do."

column2: "Nna Rabsake sanee na okohun dɛ Asiriahen reyɛ Libna do sa: osiandɛ ɔatse dɛ oetu efi Lakis."
"Na ɔtsee dɛ wɔreka wɔ Etiopiahen Tirhaka ho dɛ
column3: Oefir edzi dɛ ɔnye wo robɔko. Na aber a ɔtsee no
column4: ɔsomaa abɔfo ma wɔkɔr Hezekia nkyɛn
column7: "Mbrɛ hom nkɛka nkyerɛ Judahen Hezekia nye yi
column9: Mma mma wo Nyankopɔn a edze wo werɛ twer no no ndaadaa wo

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: ɔwoara atse dza Asiria ahemfo dze ayɛ asaase nyinara
column4: dɛ wɔasɛɛ hɔn pasapasa: na ɔwo na wɔbɛgye wo nkwa anaa?"

column2: "Ana amanaman a m'egyanom asɛɛ hɔn no hɔn enyame no egya hɔn
column6: na Edenmba a wɔwɔ Telasar no?"

column2: "Henfa na Hamathen na Arpadhen
"Na Hezekia gyee nwoma no wɔ abɔfo no nsamu
column3: na ɔkenkanee: na Hezekia sii mu kɔr EWURADZE fie
column4: na ɔkɛtserɛw mu wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Na Hezekia bɔɔ mpaa wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column6: Israel Nyankopɔn a etse kerubfo do
column7: ɔwo wankotoo ara nye asaase do ahenman nyinara do Nyankopɔn
column8: ɔwo na ayɛ ɔsor na asaase."

column2: "EWURADZE e
column6: na hwɛ: na tsie Senakerib ne nsɛm a ɔdze asoma dɛ wɔmfa mbɔsopa tseasefo Nyankopɔn no."

column2: "Ampaara
column4: Asiria ahemfo asɛɛ amanaman na hɔn asaase
column6: "na wɔatotow hɔn enyame egu ogya mu: osiandɛ wɔnnyɛ enyame
column8: dua na ɔbo; dɛm ntsi na wɔasɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column5: ma asaase do ahenman nyinara nhu dɛ ɔwo nye EWURADZE

column2: "Nna Amoz ne ba Isaia somaa ma wɔkɔr Hezekia hɔ
column6: Susuampa dɛ abɔ mpaa etsia Asiriahen Senakerib no
column8: "iyi nye nsɛm a EWURADZE aka wɔ no ho: Ɔbaabun Zion babaa no
column9: oebu wo enyimtsia na oesi wo atwetwe; Jerusalɛm babaa no a
column10: ɔawosow ne tsir wɔ wo do."

column2: "Woana na asopa no aka no ho ebususɛm yi? Na woana do na ama wo ndze do etsia
column3: na ama w'enyiwa atratra wo ntɔn wɔ no do yi? Nsɛ edze etsia Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no bi a?"

column2: "Ɔwo nam w'abɔfoe do asopa EWURADZE
column4: Medze me ntseaseanam dodow na mobɔfow maba mbepɔw etsifi
column5: akɔ Lebanon mu noho noho ara; na mubotwitwa ne nkyindur atsentsen
column6: na ne pepeaa a wɔapa no egu: na makɛhɛn n'etsifi too

column2: "Emi na metutu mbura na manom nsu
column3: na medze m'ananadze mobɔwew Egypt esutsen no nyinara."

column2: "Ana enntsee dɛ mahyehyɛ no dadaada
column3: na mifi tsetseberdo na mehyehyɛe? Afei na mama aba mu
column4: dɛ ɔwo ebɛsɛɛ nkurow a wɔagyegye ho ban

column2: "Ɔnam dɛ ekuromfo no hɔn tum suar ntsi
column3: hɔn akoma tui na hɔn enyim guu ase; wɔtse dɛ haban mu efuw
column4: dɛ eburow kwa a onnyae nnyinii."

column2: "Naaso emi
column5: na wo dam a ebɔ wɔ mo do no."

column2: "Osian wo dam a ebɔ wɔ mo do
column3: na w'enyimenamsɛm a afow ebodu m'asomu ntsi
column4: medze mo nkwaba mebɛhyɛ wo hwen mu
column5: na medze me menyiamfrɛ ato w'anomu
column6: na mebɛsan wo ekyir afa ɔkwan a enam do bae no do akɔ."

column2: "Na iyi bɛyɛ wo asɛnkyerɛdze; afe yi mu hom bedzi dza noara efifir
column3: na afe a otsia ebien no mu dza obefir noara mu epue; na afe a otsia ebiasa mu no hom ndua

column2: "Na Juda ofi mu nkaa a woefi nsa no wɔbɛgye ndwow akɔ famu bio
"Na Jerusalɛm na nkaase bi befir edzi efi
column3: na hɔn a wobefi nsa so efi bepɔw Zion do: dɔm EWURADZE ho mbɔdzembɔ na ɔbɛyɛ yi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE ka wɔ Asiriahen ho nye yi
column4: na ɔronntow hɔ egyen menaba so
column5: nkyii so ɔremmfa kyɛm mmba n'enyim

column2: "Ɔkwan a ɔnam do bae no
column3: ɔnoara so na ɔnam do bɛsan akɔ

column2: "Na mebɛper kurow yi magye no nkwa
"Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe fiir edzi kokunkum Asiriafo nserabando nyimpa mpemɔha eduowɔtwe enum: na aber a nyimpa soɛɛr anapaatu no
"Nna Asiriahen Senakerib fii hɔ na osii mu sanee
"Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a ɔrosɔr wɔ no bosom Nisrok fie no
column4: nna ne mbabanyin Adrammelek na Sarezer dze afona kum no: na wofii nsa guanee kɔr Ararat asaase do. Na ne babanyin Esar-haddon dzii hen wɔ n'ananmu."
